subject: Penn Relays (Track and Field)
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Allyson Felix ran on a pair of relay teams that set Penn Relays records, and the United States was flawless in all six relays in the U.S.A. vs. the World races at Franklin Field in Philadelphia.
snippet: Allyson Felix ran on a pair of relay teams that set Penn Relays records, and the United States was flawless in all six relays in the U.S.A. vs. the World races at Franklin Field in Philadelphia.
